import { Container, Col, Form, Row, Card, Button, OverlayTrigger, Tooltip, Alert, Tabs, Tab, } from "react-bootstrap"; import * as Icon from "react-bootstrap-icons"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import BackOfficeNav from "../BackOfficeNav"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { useNavigate, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; const ConfigureStages = () => { const params = useParams(); console.log(params); const navigate = useNavigate(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [isCheckIn, setIsCheckIn] = useState(false); const [key, setKey] = useState("activation"); const tournamentData = useSelector((state) => state.tournament.data); const tournament = tournamentData.find( (name) => name.tournament_name === params.tournamentId ); console.log(tournament); return (

Configure stage: {params.typeId} {params.configType}

setKey(k)} className="mb-3 mx-auto d-flex justify-content-center mx-5 px-5" > Number Number used to determine the order of the stages in the tournament. Two stages can not have the same number. } > Size Number of participants at the beginning of the stage. } > Name (max 30 characters) Number of divisions This stage type involves a manual matching method. All matches must therefore be manually entered in the "matching values" found in the advanced settings of each division.
Group composition
Matching method
Points Attribution? Choose how you want points to get distributed to participants depending on their results. } >
Win{" "} Award points when a player wins a match using } >
Points Place participants automatically? If enabled, participants will automatically be placed in the stage using their creation order as seeding. } >
Format{" "} Define the match format to be applied to this element (tournament, stage, group, round or match) of the tournament, and all elements that depend of it. See the{" "} match format guide {" "} for more information about the structure hierarchy and available formats. } > ); }; export default ConfigureStages;
